answers.answer: It's still early in your pregnancy so your Dr should tell you that there are no issues with you traveling or flying on a plane in June. I am 8 weeks pregnant and am on vacation now. I asked my Dr first and she said I could fly on a plane. It is when you get into the third trimester that it becomes iffy if you should travel or not.
Thank you for your comment, its put my mind at ease now, im going to see my doctor tomorrow so i will ask them about it, thankyou again :) ,, enjoy the rest of your holiday

question: Hii, i just found out today that im pregnant, i say im about 4/5 weeks gone, im not 100% sure got a doctors appointment next week, but im also type 1 diabetic, and i have a holiday booked for 11th june and im worried will i be able to go on holiday still??
title: Diabetes & Pregnant
